column1: Uchi////This is a unique high end sushi joint. I understood why majority of the reviewers gave such high marks to this place. From decor of the place to the presentation of the food
column2: it definitely exceeded my expectation. The only complaint I had was the long wait.  It took almost more than two hours to get seated.  It really was ridiculous and I was starving to the point that I almost passed out.
